# Holy Mount (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Your special mount

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 115

*Touching your special mount, you feel the divine power seep into your trusted friend and watch as a golden nimbus surrounds it.*

Your special mount gains the celestial template for the duration of the spell.
